channel.title: How to ban ip changers
channel.description:
Hey everyone, I was just wondering if there was a way to ban someone that is ip changing, If you ipban them they just change their ip.
Is it in any way you can prevent this?

item.title: How to ban ip changers
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

[quote=“V 1 N C H, post:6, topic:463160”][quote author=RiiPiiNFtW link=topic=566500.msg4119048#msg4119048 date=1349466722]

Mac ban.

But they can change it too.

You can’t change a MAC address.
[/quote]Yes you can.

Not easily.[/quote]

It’s quite easy… Depending on your type of NIC, it can be very easy to change. If not, you can just change it in the windows registry.

Read full topic

item.title: How to ban ip changers
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

I guess there is a way to bypass every kind of ban, but the more you implement within the ban, the harder it will be for them to bypass. Example, ip, mac, uid, and I believe you can also get information of that specific computer.

Read full topic
